about_the_game:
Steampunk Book

This Steampunk-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All things industrial but imagined in a fantastical way!

Vehicles, gears and punkish outfits abound!

Contents

The Steampunk book unlocks the following images:
  • Biker - 20x48
  • Digital Clock - 38x25
  • Mr. Owl - 48x74
  • Fashion - 50x55
  • Scuba - 60x60
  • False Heart - 62x64
  • Blaster - 67x34
  • Streets - 80x80
  • Clockwork - 87x98
  • Robot Guard v1.3 - 87x136
  • Mechanical Moth - 92x86
  • Crawler - 105x92
  • Cable Car - 105x109
  • Gyrocopter - 110x100
  • Airship - 130x100
  • Waterfront - 155x77
  • Steam-Bike - 160x120
  • Barkeeper - 200x100
  • Submarine - 200x180
  • Mobile City - 300x225

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
